translations: v．使恶化，使加剧：使某事物变得更糟糕或更严重。

sentences.sentence: Continued smoking exacerbates COPD, he said.
sentences.translation: 继续吸烟会使COPD恶化，他说。

sentences.sentence: To do so exacerbates vendor lock-in concerns, however.
sentences.translation: 但是，这样做却使供应商更加禁锢在自己关注的问题中。

sentences.sentence: I just want to point out that hunger exacerbates stress.
sentences.translation: 我只是想说饥饿只会使压力更大。
